nodes.text: Rastar was a city strategically placed at the back of a large harbor on the east coast of the western continent on the planet Altiria/Anarris. Rastar served as the Anarrian capital.

The structures that made up the city of Rastar were prosaic. Each part of a building served some purpose, and each building was colored according to the function it served in society, making it easier for the population to navigate the city.

Rastar housed the majority of the nation's armed forces. Large areas of the city were dedicated to the training and development of the army and the navy, and half of the harbor was set aside to build ships and maintain the Anarrian fleet.
